Privacy.Introduction: Festivalmatch uses the Spotify Web API to get data from your Spotify profile.
Privacy.LoginRequest: When you log in to festivalmatch, you will be requested to allow us to retrieve specific data from your Spotify account via the Spotify API.
Privacy.DataUsage: We will use this data (including your username, profile picture and your top artists and top songs) to give you personalized festival tips.
Privacy.DataStorage: This data is stored on our servers to enable our services.
Privacy.DataSharing: We will not share your data with any third parties.
Privacy.CookiesPolicy: We do not use any cookies.
Privacy.PolicyAgreement: By using festivalmatch, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.
Privacy.SpotifyPermissionRemoval: If at any point you wish to remove festivalmatch's permissions on Spotify, you can do so
Privacy.UserRights: You have the right to access your data, request corrections, delete your data, restrict the processing of your data, object to processing, and request the portability of your data.
Privacy.ConsentWithdrawal: You also have the right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your data at any time.
Privacy.Contact: For any questions, feel free to

SignupPage.Headline: Welcome to Festivalmatch!
SignupPage.SubHeadline: Find festivals based on your favorite artists and tracks. Simply Log in with Spotify to get personalized festival tips!

FAQ.Question1: How does Festivalmatch find the right festivals for me?
FAQ.Answer1: In order to find the best festivals for you, I give each festival in my festival database a match score based on your favorite artists and songs and the artists performing at the festival. The higher the score, the better the festival suits your musical taste!
FAQ.Question2: How does Festivalmatch use my Spotify account to recommend festivals?
FAQ.Answer2: This is how it works: After you log in with your Spotify account, Spotify allows me to query your favorite artists and songs via the WebAPI. After one hour, this access expires and I cannot request any further data from Spotify .
FAQ.Question3: Can I get festival tips without having a Spotify account?
FAQ.Answer3: No, unfortunately that's not possible yet. I am currently working on supporting Apple Music and allowing you to enter your favorite artists manually.
